version_description:
Now you can play the app with your Furby Connect toy.
Name your Furby Connect, feed it and take it to the toilet!
Furby Connect can even learn new song lyrics and phrases!
Plus various game improvements and bug fixes.

Now you can play the app with your Furby Connect toy.
Name your Furby Connect, feed it and take it to the toilet!
Furby Connect can even learn new song lyrics and phrases!
Plus various game improvements and bug fixes.

Now you can play the app with your Furby Connect toy.
Name your Furby Connect, feed it and take it to the toilet!
Furby Connect can even learn new song lyrics and phrases!
Plus various game improvements and bug fixes.

Now you can play the app with your Furby Connect toy.
Name your Furby Connect, feed it and take it to the toilet!
Furby Connect can even learn new song lyrics and phrases!
Plus various game improvements and bug fixes.
Fixed a bug that blocked some players from entering the game
Fixed a bug that blocked some players from entering the game

"Tons of sweet new stuff for you and Furby!
- FAVORITE FOODS! Fixed Furby’s taste buds. Now your Furby loves, likes, and hates different foods. What’s your Furby’s favorite food?
- MORE POOPING! Furby can now use the toilet immediately after being fed! How many times can you get Furby to use the toilet?
- NEW FURBLINGS! Eight new gold-tier Furbling eggs have been added:
o Tiger Furblings!
o Dino Furblings!
o Panda Furblings! Will you collect them all?
- HATCH FASTER! Eggs can now be hatched much faster. Furblings for everyone!
- NEW VIDEOS! Ever wondered what a Furby can do? Explore the world to discover videos showing you what’s possible with a Furby Connect toy! Can you find all of them?
- RUSSIAN LANGUAGE! You can now play the game in Russian by changing your device’s language from the settings menu.
- BUG FIXES! The game had some bugs, so Furby ate them and now they’re gone!

See you in the Furby Connect World!"
